title: Island of plastic garbage in Pacific 16 times bigger than thought - study
text:
Island of plastic garbage in Pacific 16 times bigger than thought - study 5:59am EDT - 02:12 
A giant island of plastic floating in the Pacific Ocean holds as much as 16 times more debris than was previously thought, posing a significant threat to the food chain, according to an international team of scientists. Stuart McDill reports.
